text: ai eemaanadaaron jab tumase kaha jae ki majalis mein jagah kushaada karo vah to kushaada kar diya karo khuda tumako kushaadagee ata karega aur jab tumase kaha jae ki uth khade ho to uth khade hua karo jo log tumase eemaanadaar hain aur jinako ilm ata hua hai khuda unake darje buland karega aur khuda tumhaare sab kaamon se bekhabar hai
